room_title: Escape room "Steampunk" by Alternate Reality Escape Rooms in Houston
review: We had a great experience here tonight. I would highly recommend it! We enjoyed the first room we did so much that we stayed for a second room. Very nice staff.

room_title: Escape room "Steampunk" by Alternate Reality Escape Rooms in Houston
review: One of the best we've seen. Our group really enjoyed the Steampunk challenge. There was careful attention to time period detail and a really cool atmosphere, down to the use of a soundtrack in the room!

room_title: Escape room "Steampunk" by Alternate Reality Escape Rooms in Houston
review: We went last night and had so much fun! The staff is very friendly and helpful. We were even able to play ping-pong while we waited. Iâ€™d definitely recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Steampunk" by Alternate Reality Escape Rooms in Houston
review: Best in Houston! Classy owner and staff! The rooms are designed by an engineer, everything is so creative! And they did not hold back on the decor and room setup. We have been to rooms that throw some sawdust and some fake blood on the floor and say ready go. Not here!The 1920s crazy inventor room was beautiful! And the clues were creative and challenging and so so fun! We will be back with friends!

room_title: Escape room "Steampunk" by Alternate Reality Escape Rooms in Houston
review: We didn't finish Steampunk, but it was really cool. I loved it!
